This End User License Agreement ("Agreement") is a legal agreement between you (the "User") and Installment company. By installing and using the App, you agree to be bound by the terms and conditions of this Agreement. End User License Agreement (EULA)

By installing and using the VInstallment ("App"), you agree to the following terms:
Purpose: The App is designed to control and monitor your device during the specified installment period.
Device Control: The App will enforce certain device restrictions to ensure compliance with the installment agreement.
Privacy: The App may collect device information to monitor compliance and improve functionality.
Consent: You consent to device control and monitoring during the installment period.
Termination: The license ends when the installment period ends or for non-compliance.
